website_summaries.verdict: The Acer Aspire E1-572-6870 is a high-performing budget laptop that outlasts and outperforms rivals. It's a great choice for those value-minded users who don't mind paying a little bit more to get a little more performance.
cons: Only 1,366 by 768 resolution (Display is limited to 1,366 by 768 resolution)

website_summaries.verdict: The Acer Aspire V5-571-6891 comes in as a price leader: under $500, yet it's a fully functional desktop replacement laptop rather than the stripped down netbook that you'd expect for so few ducats.
pros: Core i3 processor with Intel HD 4000 Graphics

customer_reviews.title: It just halts for 20-40 seconds at a time.
customer_reviews.text: The screen and keyboard are nice and comfortable to use. It runs fast when it is running. After an upgrade to Windows 10 it was actually greatly improved. The main problem is that it just halts for 20-30 seconds at a time every few minutes, especially when using MS Office suit applications. That pretty much renders it useless for writing or being productive in any sense. Otherwise, it runs the web browser and Netflix just fine, so it is a suitable media machine. That's pretty much what I have relegated it to.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Quality Issues
customer_reviews.text: Bought this back in April 2014 for my wife who uses it for browsing and Netflix streaming all the while being plugged in. However, in November she started reporting to me that the computer would randomly shut off and low and behold couple of days ago it refused to even start up. I am unclear on the cause of this issue which may be related to moving laptop from desk to the kitchen, to the bedroom (who knows). But wanted to make aware that to all who are considering this laptop for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Abby's Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product for the price
customer_reviews.text: GOOD: Fast i5 Processor, 15.6" Screen, 500GB HDD. Decent graphics. Ideal for surfing the net or office work but not for graphic intensive applications like gaming. BAD: Finger and hand smudges form on the black case easily. Comes with Win 8.0 and has to be upgraded to 8.1. UGLY: Lots of Junk software that needs to be removed.
customer_reviews.author: Shaam

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice laptop, and it works fairly well
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice laptop, and it works fairly well. Like others have said, though, the volume is pretty low, and the touchpad is horrible. Sometimes I have to click 3-4 times for the left click to actually register. Right click seems a little better. I pretty much use an external mouse all the time so I don't get frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: K. Steven

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly good laptop, except for the speakers - they are ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly good laptop, except for the speakers - they are barely sufficient for watching Youtube in bed, certainly not for Netflix or listening to music. I did have to install Windows 7 after having some issues specific to using software called Traktor in Windows 8.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Connections could be more sturdy, especially the power
customer_reviews.text: The power inlet is faulty. It's attachment to the motherboard must have been weak. Now that could cost the whole computer to replace the motherboard.
customer_reviews.author: Ribbonell

customer_reviews.title: Very nice laptop
customer_reviews.text: Bought one, loved it. Had to buy another. So bought one for my son. He loves it too. First time with windows 8, but so far, it's sweet. But had to get me a mouse, don't like the finger pad thing. lol
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Started off great
customer_reviews.text: This laptop was great for the first 2 weeks we owned it. Then it went downhill. The spacebar and keys required a TON of force to make sure they will show up on the screen. My wife and I will often have to re-type something because the spacebar failed to fully depress. It is the same with the keyboard as well. Aside from those problems, it is a great budget laptop.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: nice laptop
customer_reviews.text: not bulky as it does not have optical drive. nice touch pad a a sub for touch screen, is fast, happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Raj R. Gupta

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty much the best you can get for such a price. Setup was easy and everything ran buttery smoothly, and I even managed to get a respectable framerate playing bioshock infinite on Only regret is that it runs on Windows 8 instead of 7, but a few mods will solve most of your problems.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir Pudding

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop. Only problem is sometimes the space bar doesn't register. Other reviews stated the same thing. Otherwise, I love this laptop!
customer_reviews.author: ResM

customer_reviews.title: My nightmare with this laptop!
customer_reviews.text: My worst laptop experience, never functions well, very slow browsing, used only a few months, completely crushed today! Never buy Acer again!!!
customer_reviews.author: kathydewitt

customer_reviews.title: Love my Acer Aspire
customer_reviews.text: This laptop met my personal needs. Only wish there was a cd player inclusive. have no regrets and the price was just right!
customer_reviews.author: catherine

customer_reviews.title: Great, long lasting product.
customer_reviews.text: Had this laptop for at least 2-3 years now, still works perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Excelent!
customer_reviews.text: I consider excelent product... it has an excellent specs by the price... the windows is fast and comfortable, but the life battery is a little bit short. recommended to all the people
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PC Convert
customer_reviews.text: If every PC ran like this baby, I wouldn't have become a Mac person in the first place. Windows 8 is still awful, but the Acer runs like a sleek European car.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse R.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded our expectations!! Easy to set up, graphics are very good, and the keyboard is great. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a multi-purpose laptop.
customer_reviews.author: TPA

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, when it works
customer_reviews.text: I think I got a bit of a lemon, as the keyboard intermittently stops working. Other than that, it works fine. Time will tell if the seller will replace the lemon....
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son and he's happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonemadderek

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its good but at times it hangs and that is annoying and frustrating .
customer_reviews.author: Altruist

customer_reviews.title: Best if amazon can provide international warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Like it. Almost meet all my need. Fast speed, wide screen... The bad thing is the speaker! I cant really enjoy movie with it. And there is no international warranty provided ;(
customer_reviews.author: tuge lay chin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. What I expected & was looking for. Awesome price
customer_reviews.author: Wayne J. Day

customer_reviews.title: ... bought the laptop for my wife and she is happy with
customer_reviews.text: I bought the laptop for my wife and she is happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Dennis  Eaton

customer_reviews.title: The laptop is hardly 3 weeks old and am already ...
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is hardly 3 weeks old and am already facing problems with power drive failure. Also the laptop just hangs up a lot of times during work.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul

customer_reviews.title: I'm very satisfied with my purchase. No fuss no muss .
customer_reviews.text: I found the computer to be easy to set up and easy to use . It's lightweight and the screen has no glare .
customer_reviews.author: Paula Scialfo

customer_reviews.title: Easy access to the HDD and RAM to upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Over all for the price, its a decent laptop. Easy access to the HDD and RAM to upgrade. The trackpad was just too clicky for me, did not feel like it would last long. The one I got had some issues so I returned it but you might have a better experience. Windows 8 also is just really annoying
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Jan O Vista Jr

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I think it was a great value. Cheapest i5 laptop out there. Feels a little cheap but I am not complaining.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Feels a little flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Using it for business (Azket e-Intelligence(plug)), Employees love it. 4 stars because the flimsy will probably crack the first time you drop it off a table. I doubt it would survive the car top slide ad fall.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Henry D. Crockett

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Acer Aspire laptop for watching YouTube videos, listening to Pandora, and studying. Pros: Easy to start using, nice feel of the keys, crisp black, not noisy, the i5 processor works well, high quality for price, easily up gradable Cons: Not much battery life (3-4 hours at constant use), no Disc drive
customer_reviews.author: Justin Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy, But...
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop for the money, however, the touchpad is not very sensitive and the left/right click buttons are one and same lever...seems they made it for mouse users...we are such mouse users, so doesn't much matter. Audio hardware could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Ole Uncle Arch

customer_reviews.title: Love this little laptop...
customer_reviews.text: Love this little laptop, accept that it does not come with a DVD drive... so if you want to reload the OS when you get it, you will need to have an external USB DVD drive. As with most of these devices, they do not come with backup media, so you have to make your own or have a Win 8 media disk.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Unbeatable value, very happy with speed and performance. As expected there are compromises made in the casing, components and non-critical hardware to achieve the low price point. Screen is OK, but has a limited viewing angle range. Speakers are no good. The keyboard is surprisingly solid. Battery life is very good, 4hrs as listed. All in all, very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ian H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice machine. I needed something with HDMI and VGA outputs for displaying presentations. It worked great for that. I won't use it much day to day, though. Windows 8 really wants a touch screen, and the keyboard is taking longer than usual to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: James Washington

customer_reviews.title: Everything the add said was true.
customer_reviews.text: Everything's great except windows 8. One caution; like many slim sized laptops, no cd burner. Fast and sleek 2 more words, Hah!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ACER ASPIRE E1-572-6870
customer_reviews.text: the computer is fine but I am having a hard time using windows 8.1. it is not as user friendly as xp. I still1 have to do an operating system backup. I would recommend this computer,so far, to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level 4th Gen i5
customer_reviews.text: Great for school, fast and reliable. I threw an extra 4gb Ram in. Windows 8 is so so but computer is great!
customer_reviews.author: David W Priem

customer_reviews.title: Bang for buck laptop
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time buying an item using Amazon and I live in the Philippines. I ordered this a few weeks ago (Black Friday) and is very satisfied with my purchase. Although it wasn't my first - even second choice - I guess we're meant to be. 500GB HD is not an issue as I prefer to use portable anyway. Same goes that it doesn't have an internal optical drive, no problem. It looks great, not cheap at all, like a pro! Worth the wait! I am just very happy with my purchase, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolo Quimbo

customer_reviews.title: Worse than expected
customer_reviews.text: The biggest dissappointment is the sound, it's very low, practically impossible to watch movies / listen to the music without speakers. The camera stopped working for no obvious reason :(
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Not so good.
customer_reviews.text: I thought that it would update to 8.1 and not be 2 years old. Not so good.
customer_reviews.author: william wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Not much I can say here other than I got what I bought. It's an Acer, it has everything I need, and it works. If these are the specifications you are looking for in a laptop then you will be happy with this one, provided you don't get a lemon which seems to happen with all manufacturers these days. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Treliving

customer_reviews.title: I Really Like this Computer!
customer_reviews.text: I like this computer very much! I love the weight! I love the feel! My techie son helped me select this. I would love to have given 5 Stars but the Mouse isn't great. It is over-sensitive when I don't want it and not sensitive when I try to use it specifically. How does that happen????????????????? I wish I knew. It is really frustrating to have my mouse automatically highlight and delete and move to different parts of the screen while I'm typing. Other than that, I really would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Peri E.

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop for my college student. She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed a laptop for college but didn't have a ton of money to spend. This Acer fit the bill. We did our homework and found PC Mag rated it as number one for the price. Good enough for us!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Spain

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: did not like windows 8 that came with it. Sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Met all expectations
customer_reviews.text: Fast, attractive, lightweight. Glad I took PC magazine's advice. Had a portable DVD drive, so I did not miss it
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Came with malware preinstalled on it
customer_reviews.text: This laptop seems to be a good value, but mine arrived with malware preinstalled on it. I am pretty shocked and confused how something like that happens. Amazon has been helpful in providing a replacement, but I because I had already installed office on to the computer I am basically losing the value of that license. Hoping the replacement that they send is better than the first.
customer_reviews.author: Customer1

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Crap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in September 2013 and it won't boot up. Worked ok, but very sluggish up to recently. Without question, worse computer I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Acer Aspire E1-572-6870 15.6 Inch Laptop Intel i5 4200U 1.6GHz Processor, 4GB Ram, 500GB Hard Drive, Windows 8 (Clarinet Black)
product_meta.description:
Shop the Windows Store for the full selection of Windows 8 PCs




AMAZON.COM




FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Acer E1 572 6870 Notebook comes with these high level specs: 4th Generation Intel Core i5 4200U Processor 1.6GHz with Turbo Boost Technology up to 2.6GHz, Windows 8, 15.6" HD Widescreen CineCrystal LED backlit Display, Intel HD Graphics 4400 with 128MB of dedicated system memory, 4GB DDR3 Memory, 500GB SATA Hard Drive (5400RPM), Secure Digital (SD) card reader, 802.11a/b/g/n Wi Fi CERTIFIED, Bluetooth 4.0+HS, Built In HD Webcam, 1 USB 3.0 Port, 2 USB 2.0 Ports, 1 HDMI Port, 4 cell Li ion Battery (2500 mAh), Up to 4 hours Battery Life, 5.18 pounds. | 2.35 kg (system unit only).

See more
feature_bullets: Intel Core i5-4200U 3 MB Cache processor (1.6GHz/2.6GHz w/ Turbo Boost), Windows 8 64 bit
4 GB DDR3 Memory, Maximum Memory support 8GB
15.6 Inch HD Widescreen CineCrystal LED-backlit display (1366 x 768) - Intel HD Graphics 4400
webcam, HDMI, USB 3.0, card reader up to 4 hour battery(2500 mAh Lithium Ion 4 cell)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars89 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
